TopicTitle: "2001: A Space Odyssey" in KSP screenshots

Articles.Content:
*"I've still got the greatest enthusiasm and confidence in the mission. And I want to help you."*

![C7532DBAF08DB26FADEB3E8A169B905835D115D8](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28491624670430561/C7532DBAF08DB26FADEB3E8A169B905835D115D8/)

*"Dave, stop. Stop, will you? Stop, Dave. Will you stop Dave? Stop, Dave."*

![389EBBAEDB7F6FAC093BE832504090B51E677A6E](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28491624670432788/389EBBAEDB7F6FAC093BE832504090B51E677A6E/)

*"Dave, my mind is going. I can feel it. I can feel it. My mind is going. There is no question about it."*

![AC08C891D0CA5E2FF3B7741BE4C180CE16712873](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28491624670434314/AC08C891D0CA5E2FF3B7741BE4C180CE16712873/)
I like how you used the fuel cells and the 2001 helmet from pro props. Did you use in-game lights for the red effect, or no?
Yes, fuel cells, ProProps helmet and regular stock short range lights in completely red hue. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*Just what do you think you're doing, Dave?*

![3C8E49D1DC1E9C9E258C317BE4895530E4D8964A](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28492082057396322/3C8E49D1DC1E9C9E258C317BE4895530E4D8964A/)
